attributes.action:
Call for an imminent General election
Due to the financial crisis
attributes.additional_details: The damage being caused by this radical change in policy in an already turbulent world economy will ruin what little stability our economy has.
attributes.background: To motion for a general election to limit the sudden and severe damage being caused by the so called  "mini budget" imposed by Lizz Truss and the current tory government

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
